section.heading: Council authorized to establish charges for sanitary sewer service.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: repealed pursuant to § 303 of D.C. Law 11-111

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 303 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
